meanings.definition: A palm tree with fan-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The palmettos swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I love walking among the palmettos in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the palmettos.
meanings.sent4: The palmettos stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the palmettos contrasted beautifully with the blue sky.

meanings.sent1: We picnicked under the shade of the palmettos.
meanings.sent2: The palmettos formed a natural barrier along the path.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the palmettos were a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: The palmettos clustered together like a group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The rustling of the palmettos created a soothing sound in the forest.

meanings.definition: The leaves of these trees, used for thatching.
meanings.sent1: The roof of the hut was made from dried palmettos.
meanings.sent2: The villagers collected palmettos to repair their thatched roofs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat nibbled on the palmettos drying in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the palmettos filled the air as the roof was being thatched.
meanings.sent5: The thatcher expertly weaved the palmettos into a sturdy roof.
